product_name: REI Lightweight Fleece Pants - Infant/Toddler Girls'
long_description: These REI Lightweight Fleece pants feature a simple, non-bulky fit that is perfect for a toddler's active pursuits. Soft, lightweight fleece construction dries quickly, packs small and offers warmth without weighing your little one down. Non-pilling fleece continues to look sharp, season after season; reinforced knees provide abrasion resistance. Elastic waistband creates a easy, comfortable fit; gusseted crotch allows full range of motion.
